mainText:
Thank you Steve,
For all You gave me,
and my kids,
and all you gave to the world.
And I don't just mean "The Hardware"

I do not regularly shed tears for people I do not know personally,
but now,
trough the tears,
all I can say is:
"Sayonara Steve...Sayonara...and THANKS"

 From now on you will be an "Industry Standard" that everyone will be  
mesured against.
author: Marc
